welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Scherpenheuvel, where historic architecture blends with natural beauty. Take in the quaint streets and famous pilgrimage site, and immerse yourself in the local culture. Enjoy your stay and discover all that our city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zoersel Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Zoersel Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free and unlimited access for all passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Deurne/ Antwerp Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'ANR Free WiFi' from the available networks and entering their email address.
